name: Hidden Pizza
description: Tucked into a corner of the Eldorado's second floor across from The Brew Brothers, Hidden Pizza is a New York-style eatery serving pizza by the pie on weekends. Executive Chef Ivano Centemeri created a perfectly crafted pizza dough recipe for the lightly-sauced, wood-fired comfort food. The restaurant evokes old school New York pizzerias with two state-of-the-art ovens, an open-face letter board, bar-top seating with USB charging, and historic photos of old Reno.
shortDescription: Late-night New York-style wood-fired pizza tucked away on the Eldorado's second floor.
hours: Mon - Thu & Sun Closed | Fri & Sat 5pm - Closing

faqs.question: Where is Hidden Pizza?
faqs.answer: Second floor of the Eldorado, tucked in a corner across from The Brew Brothers.

faqs.question: When is it open?
faqs.answer: Friday and Saturday only, starting at 5pm through late night.

faqs.question: What style of pizza?
faqs.answer: New York-style, wood-fired with a recipe by Executive Chef Ivano Centemeri.
